Title: Tentacles of Doom
Plot: The Holy Stone of Clonrichert is to be upgraded to a class 2 relic, and unfortunately this entails three Bishops visiting the island - Father Jack must be housetrained quickly. Only one of the bishops dies - Ted therefore considers this to have been a relatively successful visit.
GuestStars: Tony Guilfoyle, Kevin Moore, Denys Hawthorne, Paddy Ward, Malcolm Douglas, Mark O'Regan
